extends java.lang.Thread
implements java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Object>

        Create new request for the given URL
        Parameters:
        sUrl - String requested URL
        oReferUrl - String Referrer URL
        sMethod - String Must be "get" or "post"
        aParams - Array with parameters to be sent along with get or post

        Object A String or a byte array containing the response to the request

        java.io.IOException - if server returned any status different from HTTP_MOVED_PERM (301), HTTP_MOVED_TEMP (302), HTTP_OK (200) or HTTP_ACCEPTED (202)
